name: Blade Spinners
description:
Hey, you! It’s spinning time! Grab your weapon and join brave, flat fighters in a series of skirmishes as they fight for glory and gold hidden in the depths of The Fortress. Put your skills to a test, developing your own fighting style with a blade control system without any predefined attacks or combinations. What you get in return is full control over your character’s arm. Block, swing, stab, lunge, parry or think of your own move that you’ll name after yourself, or your dog. We’ll leave it to you. Grab your friends and see who is the best at spinning.

Controls

Left Stick - move

Right Stick - move your hand

LB/RB - rotate your wapons

Game Modes

           

[Head Hunter]    [Team Elimination]   [Last Man Standing]

Head Hunter - collect the most kills and win 
Team Elimination - eliminate other team to gain points
Last Man Standing - last one spinning wins

Weapon Types

At the beginning of each rund players get to choose one of five weapons to spin with. It gets taken from players pool and cannot be used in later rounds. 

Weapon Select Modes

          

[Swords Only]       [Weapons Wheel]      [No Limits]

     

[Some Weapons]     [Random Only]

Players can choose different weapon modes for their game. Skirmishes can be fought using only swords,  with weapon wheel at the beginning of each round and a set number of every one weapon, without limit of weapons, with only some weapons active or let a chance decide for them.
